sqlMap.select: select faq_seq, faq_title, faq_comment, faq_wdate, faq_category, faq_writer from faq_list where faq_seq=#faq_seq# order by faq_seq asc
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO faq_list( faq_seq, faq_title, faq_comment, faq_category, faq_writer ) VALUES ( FAQ_LIST_SEQ.nextval, #faq_title#, #faq_comment#, #faq_category#, #faq_writer# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE faq_list SET faq_title = #faq_title#, faq_comment = #faq_comment#, faq_category = #faq_category# WHERE faq_seq=#faq_seq#
